snippet: The Mets played their first intrasquad game Friday, giving their coaches, front office officials, and a smattering of their fans an up-close view of some of the organization's top prospects.
abstract: The Mets played their first intrasquad game Friday, giving their coaches, front office officials, and a smattering of their fans an up-close view of some of the organization's top prospects.

headline.main: Mets Prospects Get First Chance to Impress
